reviews.review: Love this game, a classic, it never gets old.
Jogo muito bom! Jogo a bastante tempo e mesmo tendo ficado free, continua sendo um jogo muito bom. Precisa de melhoras no sistema de anti-xiter.
very addictive game, better not start
its lit like a bic i love it

Fun when it works. This game has been around forever, despite that, matches have cheaters, the accept button doesn't show up for matchmaking every now and then, the game shows notifications about VAC can't be verified because game files get corrupted unexpectedly. For a game in the market for so long, it has too many bugs. These bugs are extremely annoying and difficult to fix, you need to spend hours reading forums and even if you find a fix, the problem can happen again having to go through a very convoluted process to fix it. The game is great, don't get me wrong, I've been playing CS since 1.3 but at this point it should be stable and rock solid and it's not.

I will edit this review yearly.
As of 2022, the only problems you will experience are lack of skill, people playing on toasters and DSL, lobbies as racist as the old MW2 days, and off the charts homo-eroticism. Although i'm iffy on whether or not the last one is actually a "problem" ;)

All in all the game is as terrible as it's always been. Definitely waste your time on it.
Uno de los mejores juego q e jugado pero tiene muchos hakers
recomendo, melhor jogo que ja joguei na minha vida.

Jogo cada vez mais degradante as atualizações que fazem têm sempre em vista o dinheiro que fazem ao adicionar skins. 
Os servidores funcionam mal não registam balas óbvias cade vez existem mais bugs de imagem no jogo até no próprio novo panorama. 
Muito mau mesmo não aconselho ninguém a fazer a compra deste jogo.
